scripts.dev:backend: pkill -f cyclemetry-server || true; cd backend && uv run app.py
scripts.build:sidecar: pkill -f cyclemetry-server || true; cd backend && uv run pyinstaller --onefile --add-data "fonts:fonts" --add-data "demo.gpxinit:." --add-binary "ffmpeg:." --name cyclemetry-server-aarch64-apple-darwin app.py && mkdir -p ../src-tauri/binaries && cp dist/cyclemetry-server-aarch64-apple-darwin ../src-tauri/binaries/
scripts.buildtest: pkill -f cyclemetry-server || true; pnpm build:sidecar && pnpm dev:socket
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff check .
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff format .
